items.name: static let end: CATextLayerTruncationMode
items.desc: Each line is displayed so that the beginning fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.

items.name: static let middle: CATextLayerTruncationMode
items.desc: Each line is displayed so that the beginning and end fit in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph in the middle.

items.name: static let none: CATextLayerTruncationMode
items.desc: If the isWrapped property is true, the text is wrapped to the receiver’s bounds, otherwise the text is clipped to the receiver’s bounds.

items.name: static let start: CATextLayerTruncationMode
items.desc: Each line is displayed so that the end fits in the container and the missing text is indicated by some kind of ellipsis glyph.
